    • Method Detail

      • reindex

        @PostMapping(value="reindex")
public java.lang.String reindex(@RequestParam(value="dataDefUri",required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                               java.lang.String dataDefUri,
                                                               @RequestParam(value="fullReindex",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                               boolean fullReindex)
        An endpoint method that reindexes one or more data definitions stored in the system.
        Parameters:
        dataDefUri - The URL of an RDF file which contains one or more data definitions to be reindexed.
        fullReindex - If true, existing data for all data definitions found in the dataDefUri will be dropped before being reindexed.
        Returns:
        Plain string describing what happened.

      • log

        @GetMapping(value="log")
public java.lang.String log()
        An endpoint method that returns the contents of the application log.
        Returns:
        The contents of the application log wrapped in <pre> HTML tag.
